0101101101100011 1101111000100110 1 -> sum: 0011100110001010, cout: 1
1101010110001001 1000101110010100 1 -> sum: 0110000100011110, cout: 1
1001010000000011 0101011111000011 0 -> sum: 1110101111000110, cout: 0
1001001010111000 1100111010000000 0 -> sum: 0110000100111000, cout: 1
0111011100001101 0111000100010101 1 -> sum: 1110100000100011, cout: 0
1001111111110011 1001100010001101 0 -> sum: 0011100010000000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
